title: MySQLLCASE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLLCASE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert the text to lower-case:
SELECT LCASE("SQL Tutorial is FUN!");

Definition and Usage
The LCASE() function converts a string to lower-case.
Note:
The
LOWER()
function is a synonym for the LCASE() 
function.
Syntax
LCASE(
text
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
text
Required. The string to convert
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Convert the text in "CustomerName" to lower-case:
SELECT LCASE(CustomerName) AS LowercaseCustomerName
FROM Customers;
